sentences.en: Some speakers, if they're reading from a complete text, underling the words they want to emphasize.
sentences.cn: 有的演说者在诵读全文的时候, 在他们想要强调的词下面划线.

sentences.en: The underling mechanism of species diversity on primary production and ecosystem stability was different.
sentences.cn: 物种多样性对于生产力和稳定性的作用机制并不相同,超产和稳定性之间并不必然存在联系.

trans.tran_en: an insulting word for someone who has a low rank – often used humorously
